description: This file defines the CSS styles for managing themes and the layout of the App component in a futuristic photo gallery interface. It includes variables for light and dark themes, styles for the App header, links, logos, and a theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container with center-aligned text and background color dependent on the theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: The header section of the application styled for responsiveness and theme adaptability.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, adapting to theme-based color variables.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes with hover and active states.
